message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a great product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $90 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $85. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. How about we split the difference and go with $87.50? I think that's fair for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still can't afford to pay $87.50. I would like to stick to my original offer of $85 if possible. Thank you!
